remarks: A constructed outer measure is monotone.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 15-Sep-2019.)
statement:
oms.m $e |- M = ( toOMeas ` R ) $.
oms.o $e |- ( ph -> O e. V ) $.
oms.r $e |- ( ph -> R : ~P O --> ( 0 [,] +oo ) ) $.
oms.0 $e |- ( ph -> ( R ` (/) ) = 0 ) $.
omsmon.a $e |- ( ph -> A C_ B ) $.
omsmon.b $e |- ( ph -> B C_ O ) $.
omsmon $p |- ( ph -> ( M ` A ) <_ ( M ` B ) ) $.
